trans-unit.source: Implements a selectable item inside a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Implementerar ett valbar objekt inuti en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > By default, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> of a ComboBoxItem is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Som standard <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>för en ComboBoxItem är inställd på <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default horizontal position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Vågrät placering en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>är <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> property of a ComboBoxItem through a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, the panel's default is applied and the item will be centered.
trans-unit.target: Om du ställer in den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>egenskapen för en ComboBoxItem via en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>panelens standard tillämpas och objektet centreras.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A ComboBoxItem is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: En ComboBoxItem är en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, vilket innebär att den kan innehålla ett enskilt objekt av en annan typ (till exempel en sträng, en bild eller en panel).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ComboBoxItem Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ComboBoxItem controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Anpassa den ComboBoxItem kontroll att använda samma egenskapsinställningar för flera ComboBoxItem kontroller, Använd den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ändra standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>att ge unik för kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om hur du skapar en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, se [anpassa utseendet på en befintlig kontroll genom att skapa en ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ComboBoxItem, see [ComboBox Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Delar och tillstånd som är specifika för ComboBoxItem finns [ComboBox-format och mallar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Beroendeegenskaper för den här kontrollen kan ställas in av kontrollens standardformat.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Om en egenskapen anges av ett standardformat kan egenskapen ändras från standardvärdet när kontrollen visas i programmet.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardformatet som bestäms av vilka tema används när programmet körs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [standard WPF teman](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ComboBoxItem control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Visual egenskapen endast har betydelse om egenskapen är båda finns i ComboBoxItem kontrollens standardmall och anges genom att använda en.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Du hittar en lista över visuella egenskaper i avsnittet "Ändra Visual struktur för ett Control" i [anpassa utseendet på en befintlig kontroll genom att skapa en ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem"></xref> class
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem"> </xref> klass

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the item is highlighted.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om objektet är markerat.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used by styles that need a highlight to indicate selection.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen kan användas av formatmallar som behöver en markering som visar markering.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, IsHighlighted has a protected setter.
trans-unit.target: Från och med .NET Framework version 3.0 har Service Pack 1, IsHighlighted en skyddad setter.

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill använda den här funktionen ska programmet rikta .NET Framework version 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [versioner och beroenden](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier Field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem"></xref> is highlighted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem"> </xref> är markerade, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem.IsHighlighted*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem.IsHighlighted*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem.IsHighlighted*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>egenskapsändringar.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>

trans-unit.source: Old content.
trans-unit.target: Gammalt innehåll.

trans-unit.source: New content.
trans-unit.target: Nytt innehåll.

trans-unit.source: Announces that the keyboard is focused on this element.
trans-unit.target: Annonserar att tangentbordet fokuserar på det här elementet.

trans-unit.source: Keyboard input event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Tangentbordsinmatning händelseargument.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Svarar på en <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Responds to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Svarar på den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Responds to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Svarar på den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs"> </xref>.
